name: Florida Smash
description:
Its game of logic, becouse player has to solve riddles. Its also game of imagination becouse player has  to imagine that it is 1985 now.

Player controlls butterfly that causes hurricanes in Florida by fluffering its wings.

Use WSAD to move butterfly ("%") abd generate wind in opposite direction, press space to wait and see how wids behave. Make wind collext pluses, avoid minuses. Mind arrow fields ("<,>,V,^") they will change your winds direction.
